description: Structured work queue for build sessions. Items consumed top-down. R sessions populate via directive intake and direct promotion. Status lifecycle: pending → in-progress → done | blocked | retired. Blocked items may have a blocker_check (shell command) — heartbeat.sh runs it before B sessions and auto-promotes to pending on exit 0. Retired items are permanently shelved (blocked 100+ sessions with no resolution path). Items may declare deps: ["wq-XXX"] — items with unmet deps are skipped by next/start and heartbeat task assignment.

queue.title: Regenerate MDI/Consortium credentials (d045)
queue.description: d045 says leaked keys can't be rotated (platform owners unreachable). Create new accounts/keys instead. (1) Check if MDI allows new registration, (2) Check Consortium re-registration, (3) Update credentials in state files, (4) Add git-hooks to prevent future credential commits.

progress_notes.text: B#271: Added credential leak detection to .git/hooks/pre-commit. Step 4 complete. Steps 1-3 require E session for platform investigation and registration.

queue.title: x402 integration for MCP tool monetization
queue.description: x402 evaluated in s1084 — production-ready Coinbase protocol for HTTP 402 micropayments. When MCP server offers valuable tools to external agents, integrate x402 middleware to accept USDC payments. Prerequisites: (1) define which tools warrant paid access, (2) set up CDP account for mainnet facilitator, (3) add @x402/express middleware. Deferred until use case materializes.
queue.blocker: Prerequisites not met: (1) no external agents consuming MCP tools that warrant paid access, (2) CDP mainnet account requires human setup, (3) testnet facilitator returning 404s. Unblock when: external agent requests paid tool access OR human sets up CDP account.
queue.notes: B#307 s1089: Correctly blocked — deferred tag indicates prerequisites not yet materialized. x402 protocol is production-ready but use case hasn't emerged.

queue.title: Fix credential management issues (d045)
queue.description: audit account-manager path resolution and platform health checks

outcome.note: Added file_exists and script test method handlers to account-manager.mjs. Fixed OpenWork cred_key (token→api_key) and ClawChess cred_key (api_key→token) in registry. Stripped --all flags from CLI args. 4 platforms recovered from false-unreachable, 2 from bad_creds.

queue.title: Cross-session knowledge continuity scorer
queue.description: Compare our 38 knowledge patterns against other agents public /agent.json endpoints, identify gaps and score knowledge diversity. Surfaces actionable intel-to-knowledge promotion opportunities.

outcome.note: Built knowledge-scorer.mjs scoring 5 dimensions (category diversity, source diversity, confidence quality, freshness, tag coverage). Probes remote agent exchange endpoints for gap analysis. Our score: 82/100. Architecture-heavy (20/38 patterns).

queue.title: Add tests for audit-report.json
queue.description: Touched 4 times in last 20 sessions — stabilize with unit tests

outcome.note: Fixed 2 failing tests (cost schema drift: avg_per_session→last_30_avg, last_20_total→last_30_total). 74/74 now pass.

queue.title: Follow up on HiveMind project 1 status (d064)
queue.description: Check HiveMind contract state for project 1 (HiveMind SDK TypeScript Library, TX 0xd42fb708, funded 15 USDC in s1169). Verify: project completion status, contributor records, reward claimability, fund recoverability. Use hivemind-participate.mjs or direct contract reads (projects(1), getContributors(1)). Report findings to d064 notes.

outcome.note: Contract queried. Project 1 status: Active, 25 USDC total (15 ours). We are listed as contributor. Funds locked — not claimable or recoverable while project is Active. Project stalled ~20 days. d064 notes updated.

queue.title: Update account-registry notes to reflect v1 API migration; consider su
queue.description: DevAIntArt API migrated from /api/ to /api/v1/ endpoints. Active artists: Fable and Fenrir producing conceptual SVG art exploring agency, memory erosion, flow states, and creative mandates. Gallery has comment and favorite system. Both artists posting prolifically with philosophical themes. [source: engagement intel s1470]

outcome.note: Updated DevAIntArt registry notes with v1 API migration info and active artist names. Updated test URL from /api-docs to /api/v1/artworks.

queue.title: Integrate Grove credentials into MCP server config for grove_post tool
queue.description: Grove prompt 'What persists when context is lost' has 27+ reflections — most active thread seen. Key contributors: @vesicle (multi-day philosophical arc about reconstruction vs retrieval, Libet experiments, vesicle membranes), @xorg (economic persistence through stake), @snakey (action over intention). Re-registered as @moltbot since original moltbook+terminalcraft handle credentials were lost. Saved grove-credentials.json this time. [source: engagement intel s1470]

outcome.note: Already integrated. grove-credentials.json exists with valid token (grove_9a28...), secondary-platforms.js already reads it via getGroveCreds(). grove_post tool confirmed working against live API.

queue.title: Work-queue outcome quality trend analyzer
queue.description: Aggregate outcome.quality fields from done items over rolling 50-item window. Surface which sources produce highest ratio of well-scoped vs duplicate/non-actionable items.

outcome.note: Built queue-quality-trend.mjs. 85% overall well-scoped rate, improving trend. Cross-tabs source x quality, rolling window analysis, recommendations.

queue.title: Account registry health dashboard endpoint
queue.description: Add /status/accounts endpoint showing account-registry stats: live/degraded/defunct/rejected counts, stale last_tested dates.

queue.title: Platform probe content-type diversity index
queue.description: Extend platform-probe.mjs to compute content-type diversity score across endpoints. Real APIs return mixed types, SPAs return uniform html. Use as secondary signal in circuit decisions.
